hero.title: Scaling is Just the Beginning. Accelerating with Intelligence is the Real Challenge.
hero.subtitle: We offer fractional executive leadership as Chief Growth Officer (CGO) for companies looking to grow with strategy, speed and control—without assuming the cost of a full-time C-Level.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Mauricio Uribe, a C-Level executive with over 20 years of experience leading business growth, digital transformation and international expansion in Latin America. I have built operations from scratch, scaled startups and led multinational teams. Today I support organizations as Fractional CEO and Senior Consultant to accelerate their growth and professionalize their structure. MBA, Finance Specialist, and active member of boards of directors with global business vision.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: I have scaled companies in Latin America, multiplying revenues and leading international expansions in record time.

global.title: Global Business Vision
global.description: Experience as Country Manager in Colombia, Mexico and Venezuela. Participant in international innovation and venture capital programs.

leadership.title: Strategic Leadership
leadership.description: Fractional CEO and senior consultant with experience in digital transformation, team building and growth acceleration.

ipsos.title: Growth from $0 to $3M in revenue
ipsos.description: I led the complete market entry strategy and operational construction for Venezuela. I established local alliances, formed a high-performance team and implemented scalable processes that generated sustainable growth in 3 years.

virtual.title: 9x value multiplication
virtual.description: I transformed a digital organization through strategic pivots, technological integration and market expansion. I implemented data-driven decision making and agile methodologies that multiplied the company's value by 9 in just two years.

corporate.title: Ready to play in the big leagues?
corporate.description: Proven experience leading projects with Fortune 500 clients and large corporations. We connect strategy and execution to generate real impact in world-class organizations.

leadership.title: Vision, Execution and Results across 7 industries
leadership.description: Board member, with 3 postgraduate degrees in Senior Management and experience as Country Manager in Colombia, Mexico and Venezuela. I have generated real growth in 7 different sectors, integrating vision, execution and results.

conexcol.title: Financial Transformation
conexcol.description: In just 24 months, we reversed a negative cash flow of -80M COP to a positive cash flow of nearly +90M COP at Conexcol through strategy, operational control, and high-impact decisions. We didn't just generate revenue. We turned structures into positive cash flow machines.

rates.title: Leadership Investment
rates.subtitle: Flexible, results-oriented service structure, adapted to the size and stage of your organization.

consultoria.name: Strategic Consulting
consultoria.description: Market entry, expansion and sustained growth

ceo.name: Fractional CEO
ceo.description: C-Level executive leadership without the fixed cost
